lines.text: I think I’ve got it! Why Slick didn’t just move out of the way!
That Stop Wizard could cast <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum-</c> which freezes things in place!
Oh. Right. There’s just a magic spell that does exactly the thing I was talkin’ about.
I guess I’ve got sort of a blind spot for people randomly breakin’ the laws of physics.
Fine. Makes sense. That Stop Wizard cast all his spells to try to stop the robber- probably started with the freeze, then the memory…
And Flesh to Stone would have to be last, since he couldn’t cast anything else if he was a statue.
